split system conversion factors SEER2/SEER = 0.95, HSPF2/HSPF = 0.85 (see RESNET source)

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies
source_data.author: U.S. Energy Information Administration

notes: Heating multiple of 8% was determined by dividing square feet in which main heating equipment is gas furnace (14491406 sf) by square feet in which main heating equipment is gas furnace or packaged unit (176461522 sf)

cooling multiple of 63% was determined by dividing square feet in which cooling equipment is residential split system or individual AC unit  AND heating equipment is natural gas (23128802 sf) by square feet with same cooling constraint and heating across all fossil fuel types (36556957 sf). Ventilation multiples determined by square feet in which given ventilation system (VAV or CAV) is paired with given heating system for the measure.
